bug.author: b0noI
bug.summary: Links on the page with the RNN tutorials are broken

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/b0noI>@b0noI</denchmark-link> , We are removing these old tutorials from website. You can find them here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dmlc/mxnet/tree/master/example/rnn/old>https://github.com/dmlc/mxnet/tree/master/example/rnn/old</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kevinthesun>@kevinthesun</denchmark-link> ack, though, main bug is just about the fact that customer facing page with the tutorial have broken links, we need either remove the page or update the links.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/orgs/apache/teams/mxnet-committers>@apache/mxnet-committers</denchmark-link> : This issue has been inactive for the past 90 days. It has no label and needs triage. For general "how-to" questions, our <denchmark-link:https://discuss.mxnet.io/>user forum</denchmark-link> (and <denchmark-link:https://discuss.gluon.ai/>Chinese version</denchmark-link> ) is a good place to get help.
that specific tutorial is no longer offered.
